name: Maurice Madison
summary: United States Army veteran with expertise in property accountability, logistics and configuration management. Technically skilled in mechanical and electrical maintenance, problem solving, leadership and operations. Strong interpersonal and communication skills; adept at multitasking, team leadership, and customer-focused service; committed to quality and continuous improvement.

experience.title: Construction Equipment Repairer/ Shop Foreman/ Squad Leader
experience.description: Heavy construction vehicle repairer mechanic; oversaw and performed maintenance on equipment used for earth moving, grading, compaction, loading, quarrying, mixing, surfacing, pumping and powered bridging. Supervised 40 personnel, supported over 2,000 troops in four countries; managed an inventory of 1,500 line items and material assets valued at $65M including large vehicles. Areas of expertise included personnel management, logistics, and operations; senior management level with strategic planning and tactical application; effective decision-maker in high-pressure environments; maintained accountability during redeployment of sensitive items and communication equipment.

experience.title: Cashier
experience.description: Customer service role; greeted customers, accounted for purchases, and ensured accuracy of orders; handled cash; assisted in food preparation; trained new employees with hands-on computer instruction and A/V orientation.
